message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth from your perspective. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1300000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between reflecting the product's intrinsic value and offering you a fair deal. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable creation into your possession.
